rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Multi Sampling の超ざっくりとしたイメージ

switch.text: Multi Sampling の超ざっくりとしたイメージ

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 295px; margin-left: 42px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 351px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
このピクセルを描画する際に、複数のサンプリングポイント
から計算して色を算出する

switch.text: このピクセルを描画する際に、複数のサンプリングポイント から計算して色を算出する

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 288px; height: 1px; padding-top: 525px; margin-left: 25px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: ★Multi Sampling はオブジェクトの輪郭のみ行われる

switch.text: ★Multi Sampling はオブジェクトの輪郭のみ行われる

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 555px; margin-left: 25px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #007FFF; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#007FFF, #319eff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
= オブジェクトの内部 や オブジェクトではない
ピクセルでは行われないので、最低限の処理で済む

switch.text: = オブジェクトの内部 や オブジェクトではない...

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 127, 255), rgb(49, 158, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 127, 255), rgb(49, 158, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 127, 255), rgb(49, 158, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 127, 255), rgb(49, 158, 255));
